other_tests.findings: Mild axonal sensory polyneuropathy, consistent with absent ankle reflexes.

other_tests.procedure_name: Biopsy of the right frontal cortex
other_tests.findings: Discrete edema, hyperplasia of endothelial cells, microglial activation, and axonal ballooning surrounded by a reactional gliosis, consistent with acute ischemia without inflammation.
Reduced number of peroxisomes in skin fibroblasts, which were increased in size.

other_tests.procedure_name: Molecular analysis of the AMACR gene
other_tests.findings: Identified a homozygous c.559G > A (G187R) mutation which was absent in more than 100 tested controls.

other_tests.procedure_name: Biochemical analysis on cultured skin fibroblasts
other_tests.findings: Impaired rate of pristanic acid oxidation (46% of the mean control), in line with AMACR deficiency.
